name: Aberline - Chapter 1: A Girl From Fairyland
name_original: Aberline - Chapter 1: A Girl From Fairyland
description:
Aberline is a free RPG Adventure game with an anime graphic style which is divided into Chapters with different titles for each chapter, and each chapter can be played for approximately 1 to 2 hours.

Aberline - Chapter 1 : A Girl From Fairyland is our very first release, hope you will enjoy it.

This game still has some things to improve, your constructive feedback will be very valuable for us.
